episodes.title: Dr. Miracle I 1. The Alkaline Diet
episodes.description: From his stunning avocado ranch in San Diego County, Dr. Robert Young devotes his life to spreading the word about the increasingly popular alkaline diet. Tony Robbins becomes a fan, and one of Dr. Young’s patients is featured on Oprah. Up in the Bay Area, a young mother of three, Dawn Kali, gets a diagnosis that leads her to Dr. Young’s ranch for a fateful stay. Unlock all episodes of Chameleon: Dr. Miracle, ad-free, right now by subscribing to The Binge.
